eventName: What the Snow's Like Far Away
storyName: What the Snow's Like Far Away
storyInfo: An operator helped out by Pudding goes to Sami to carry out a mission. One day, Pudding receives a letter from her.

attributes.content: Don't worry about it, I'm making some adjustments.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Rookie Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Here... we should be almost done.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Next is to connect the power supply module... Celica, can you check the screen?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: The data... they're stabilizing.
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Alright, problem solved.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Thank you... Was there something wrong with my design...?
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Oh, no, just a minor issue. The system's operating environment exceeded the universal voltage stabilizer's control range, and the power surge blew out some components.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I replaced all the damaged parts and adjusted the voltage stabilizer's circuitry, so there shouldn't be any more problems in the future.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: To think I've been working overtime just to fix a simple problem I couldn't even diagnose...
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: It's not your fault; who'd expect such a simple problem from such a complex machine.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: *sob*—
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Ah, don't beat yourself up over it... Here, you'll feel better after some hot cocoa.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: This is... coffee... *sob*...
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Sorry!
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Pudding... Am I just not cut out to be a electrical engineer?
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Let's not be hasty!
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: At the very least, I think you're really talented at this, and you're a hard worker, too.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: But I always mess up at work...
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Instructor Dobermann always says that rookies have to fail in order to grow.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Last time it was the coupling circuit, and this time I couldn't even find such a minor fault...
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: If you look at it another way, you can technically call this progress.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: But I still have to work overtime to clean up my own messes...
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: It's alright, I'm always working overtime too.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: But it's different with you, Pudding.
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: You work overtime to help us balance out the workload and smooth everything over.
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: I mean... you're skilled enough to turn Closure's wild ideas into actual, production-ready blueprints.
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: You can calculate an entire project's specs just from the data, without conducting any on-site surveys, accurately enough to build an equipment installation setup in the workshop.
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: I have to give it my all just to finish my assignments, but it's probably child's play for you, Pudding.
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Celica, I...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm not too good at comforting people.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: But I'm sure you've just hit a stumbling block. I've run into difficulties before too, and my grandpa taught me how to face them.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Whenever I feel like giving up, I just recall the happiest I've been while working. As long as I keep at it, I know I'll experience that joy again.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: So... maybe you can try that, too?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: The happiest I've been... have I ever enjoyed it...?
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Pudding.
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: What... what's your happiest moment like? I want to know.
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Me? Let me see... I wish I could say it's whenever I finish my tasks ahead of schedule, but honestly it'd have to be...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Probably when I went to Sami with a Columbian engineering team as a student.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: You've been to Sami? The mysterious land in the north, with all its ancient icefields and majestic mountains?
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: I've been there plenty of times as a child, because of family circumstances.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I've only read about it in books. Is the landscape really full of oddities beyond imagination?
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Actually, most of my trips were for family vacations, so we never went too deep. My impression of Sami is just a land of pure white.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Except for the one time I followed the engineering team into a wetland settlement.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: A trip to the wetlands is as damp as it sounds, so it's hardly a vacation spot, but... it's special to me.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Wow.
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Even now, I can still remember the moment the first electric lamp lit up in the settlement. The smiles of the Sami people are deeply etched in my mind.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: It was the first time I truly understood how technology had the power to reshape people's lives, and bring them... happiness.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: And then I wondered, what if I became a professional electrical engineer, and continued building bridges to the future, just like I did then?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Bridges... to the future.
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Hehe, all you have to do is figure out what you want, and then work hard at it. I mean, I'm an electrical engineer now, right?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Oh, I just remembered. If you're interested in Sami, I have one more thing...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: A snow globe souvenir from a Sami resort. It has a miniature model of a Sami settlement inside.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Thanks...
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: The young Engineering operator stares at the snow globe in her hands, lost in thought.
...Yeah! This is it!
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Was that directed at me?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Pudding, thank you so much! I get it now!
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Ah, no, I just shared my thoughts, that's all...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I, Celica Wilson, will not give in so easily! From now on, I'll strive my hardest to improve myself, and at the very least, become independent!
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Um... Well, I'm glad you've cheered yourself up at least.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I must act now, and focus on finishing my remaining work!
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: I'll also—
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Suddenly, I'm very interested in something related to you!
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: M-Me?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I just remembered, but haven't you been on this landship for a long time? Closure mentioned that your skills have improved a lot since you first arrived.
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Have you ever thought of going back to Sami to experience your happiest moment again?
attributes.name: Celica

attributes.content: Go... back to Sami?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: (Places a letter on the table)
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: ...This topic again. Father mentioned our old holiday trips, and hopes I can go back with them when I'm on vacation.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Pillow, do you dream of Sami too?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I dreamed of it yesterday night.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I was looking down from someplace high up, at the wetlands, at the Myrkwood, at the snow-covered Fjal Vetrtonn, and finally at an endless icefield.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Everywhere I looked matched up with what I remember.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: The roadside grass sleeping within a blanket of snow, the night pulling over the aurora like a curtain, and the icefield breeze blowing their time away.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I also dreamed of the gift shop where I met you, Pillow.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: You and your friends were crowding the shelf, with snow globes as your neighbors.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: The snowflakes were floating, falling on the small hut in the settlement. I waved my hand and a light lit up the roof.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: What do you think? Should we go back to Sami?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Although...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Help... Is there anyone out there...?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Anyone... please help me...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I'm so scared.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I know my parents are waiting at home for us to set off for Sami together, but it might be dangerous on the way back.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Huh? We'll have friends escorting us home?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: But even so... what if the engine suddenly catches fire, or the aircraft hits a fowlbeast mid-air and breaks down?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: The scariest thought is probably that I'll trip over a rock just when I step outside, and then I fall right onto a piece of sharp debris...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: No, absolutely not! I can't go out that far anymore...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Dreams... dreams are much safer, don't you agree?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Let's have another dream, Pillow.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: We're clocking out, Pudding. See you tomorrow.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: See you.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Don't overdose on coffee, okay? You're a hard worker, but you should still take care of your health.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: You're the only one who works overtime in the workshop, ever since Celica left.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Celica... left? No wonder I haven't seen her in a while.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Oh, you didn't know?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: She left the landship for a mission two months ago, after she passed her field operations assessment.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Her skills have improved so much... I guess it's good that she's taking on new challenges.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I heard she was so excited, she had trouble sleeping the night before she left. She had really been looking forward to that mission.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: No surprise there though. I'd also love to be able to visit Sami alongside the Columbian engineering team.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Eh? So she really did go to Sami...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: You've been there before too, right? Ah, I'm so jealous, getting to see all that beautiful scenery you only ever hear about in stories.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Let me tell you a secret. Whenever we chatted, Celica would treat you like some sort of idol. So maybe she went to Sami to follow in your footsteps.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: I doubt it... Who would idolize me?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Do you know, Pillow? Celica's gone to Sami.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I'm sure she's excited to see all those sights with her own eyes. I'm really happy for her.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Huh, at this hour?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Good evening, Pudding. I've got a letter for you, from Sami. The sender is... Celica.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Ah.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Well then, have a good night.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: I guess I should read it.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: ...She says she's entered Sami territory.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'I had imagined many magnificent sights on my way here, but when I finally set foot on Sami soil, I realized the vastness of this great land exceeded the limits of my imagination.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Fowlbeasts with gray tail feathers soar into the skies, as powder snow falls onto the branches like petals. A mushroom opens up into a crystal-clear umbrella, like a glass bowl filled with sunlight.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'These fantastical sights have had me enraptured since I got here.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: And then there's just some standard greetings. I'm glad she didn't...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Don't blame me, Pillow.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I'll come clean. It's kind of rude, but I originally wanted to pretend it didn't exist at all...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: You know, my parents always mention this and that about Sami whenever they send a letter. So I was worried she'd say something similar, asking me to go too or something.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: But I'm too scared to...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Sorry, Celica! I'll write you a reply tomorrow!
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Oh, seems like there's another paragraph at the bottom.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Oh right, my engineer colleagues told me spring in Sami was approaching. Guess what I found in the snow?'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'The answer is in the enclosed photo. Remember to make a guess before you look, though.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: The photo...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: No, Pillow. We have to make a guess before we look.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: You're guessing mushrooms? Then I... I'm guessing it's a pretty ice cube.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Now, it's time to find out!
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Ah, the snow... it's melting.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: The snow on the grass has dwindled, revealing sporadic patches of green.
A pink flower bud has shed off its white clothing, swaying leisurely in the breeze.
The moment is perfectly framed in the photo.
It's a beautiful scene.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Pillow, have we... ever seen spring in Sami before?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: You're thinking the same too, right? But it's impossible...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: It's going to take some time to finish my current work, and then I'd have to submit a trip application, so wouldn't spring be over by the time we arrive in Sami? Besides...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: We've already tried so many times... I can't go somewhere that far.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Oh, I know, why not just ask Celica to take some more photos for us?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I'll write her a letter now!
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Dear Celica...'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Pudding, has Celica's letter arrived yet?
attributes.name: Medical Department Operator

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I just did some napkin math, and it's been almost two months! It should have arrived by now!
attributes.name: Medical Department Operator

attributes.content: Ah, I'm so excited I don't feel like working...
attributes.name: Medical Department Operator

attributes.content: Working hours are almost over anyway.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Are you not working overtime today, Pudding? You've been sitting there for the past half hour.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Why don't we go grab a bite together? We can talk about Celica's travel diary. Are you good with spicy food? What about barbecue?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Um, me? I'm fine with anything...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: My favorite story has got to be the time Celica ate the fodder the Sami people feed their burdenbeasts as if they were biscuits, hahaha. That's just too funny.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: What about the time the engineering team was setting up equipment against the Sami people's wishes, and she stepped in and cleverly resolved the conflict. Now that was a wonderful moment!
attributes.name: Medical Department Operator

attributes.content: What about you, Pudding? Which one is your favorite?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Hey, everyone! The thing you've all been waiting for is here—Celica's letter!
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Quick, let me see!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: S-Slow down...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Hey, look at this part, haha! I'm laughing so hard my stomach hurts!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Celica says the engineering team is about to leave the Myrkwood, and is heading towards the wetlands in the northeast...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Our captain told me our first stop in the wetlands was near a Sami settlement, where the engineering team had previously installed some basic power facilities.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'I'm guessing there's a high chance this is the same settlement you visited.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'I think you must be as excited as I am to find out how life has changed here after getting electricity.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Although I ran into some unpleasantness along the way, I still couldn't help but burst into laughter from realizing I could fulfill my wish then and there.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Do you still remember what we talked about that day? Going forward, I decided to use my skills to transform people's lives.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'So, my goal is to do everything I can to optimize the settlement's electrical system.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Think you could give me some tips, Pudding?'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Pudding? Are you leaving?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Sorry, I can't hang out with you guys tonight.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I need to... make some preparations.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Good morning, Ball... *huff* The corridor is so cold.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I was shivering all over when I came here this morning, but I checked the temperature control terminal and the air-conditioning in this corridor isn't even on.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: The cold air doesn't seem to be coming from the vents... but from that direction.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Over there... That's the electrical engineering lab!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: C-Cold... Ah, the floor is all wet!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Is there flooding in the laboratory...? Is there anyone inside?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm doing some waterproofing, there are shoe covers are by the door.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: So it's you, Pudding... Are you simulating an engineering environment? Are you simulating... Sami?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Yeah... To be more precise, it's a wetlands environment. This is the first time I've simulated this kind of natural environment in the lab...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: So many coffee bags... Were you here all night?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: I'm fine... Um, sorry, could you help me? I'm in a bit of a pickle.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Let me see... Gah! What's this stuck on my shoe?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: That would be the aquatic plants I'm repurposing as cables for the simulation, please be careful.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: This is... Are you trying to test out the latest power transmission tech in a Sami wetland environment?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Yup.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I'm sure it could greatly improve the stability and control of long-distance power transmission, but are you sure it'll work?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: In theory. According to the previously established parameters for the Originium substation and power equipment, at any rate.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Celica also helped research and develop the tech, so modifying the equipment and laying out the cables shouldn't be too difficult for her.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: The key issue is controlling the power load. If you look at the power flow calculations here, this part should be able to function normally after modification...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: But given the potential spikes in power consumption after future developments, I realized it would critically overload.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I've been thinking about this for a while, but still haven't figured it out.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Pudding... I think I came across a similar problem before. Could you wait for a moment while I go look up the solution I found last time?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Greyy grabs a stack of papers and wades back through the water.
Afterward, they discuss the engineering issue in earnest, ignoring the 'swamp' reaching up to their ankles.
Sent the letter.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Alright, we're done here. Let's leave the rest to Celica.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Thank you both... for taking time out of your schedules to help me out.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Don't sweat it, I'm actually really happy to get a chance to help you out.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: I have to say though, Sami's environment is just so complicated. The myriad factors you have to keep in mind just make my head hurt. Only you could've thought this through so meticulously without being on-site, Pudding.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: You have to finish this, Celica, so don't screw it up!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: I'm just scared of any other variables I might have missed...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I'm sure your proposal will be able to meet the power supply requirements of a modern village, so please don't worry yourself sick.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Yeah, you've done a great job. We're bound to miss something without conducting an on-site survey ahead of time, so don't overthink it.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Besides, the actual environment is always changing, and no one can calculate every possibility.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: ...I guess it would have been better if we did do an on-site survey for this project proposal.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: It's fine, we all know you don't like going outside. No need to force yourself to do something you don't want to.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Am I... unable to help everyone to the best of my abilities?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Why would you think that?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: But going outside... I'm afraid of making a mistake again, or running into some sort of danger...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: At this point... No need to worry, Pudding.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: If you'd ever like to try stepping outside, we can accompany you wherever you go, just like what we did now.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Pillow, Celica's letter hasn't arrived yet.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Yes, I won't be working overtime today, but I just wanted to wait here.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Should I get a cup of coffee...? I do miss the taste of hot cocoa when I'm not working overtime though.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I look unhappy? You know that I've been at a loss recently.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: In retrospect, I did work on some simulation experiments while helping everyone implement their ideas, back when I had just arrived on Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Maybe those experiments gave me a false sense of security, made me think I could become a good engineer even if I stayed in a closed environment.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: But maybe, things have quietly changed outside, as time flows in the breeze, with us none the wiser.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Oh, how I envy Celica... I really want to know what she's seen...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Good evening, Pudding!
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Is Celica's letter here?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Yes, it's for you. Have a good night.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Quick, open it!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: I can't wait any longer.
attributes.name: Medical Department Operator

attributes.content: Um... huh? When did you guys get here?
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: We... just happened to be passing by. Uh, right, we were on our way to get some hot cocoa.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Here, this cup's for you.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Alright, enough about us, what did Celica write this time?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Dear Pudding, you might find it difficult to take in what I'm about to tell you. I was also shocked when I first saw it.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Let me figure out how to say this...'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: The rest of this page is blank.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Let's look at the next page, I think there's writing on it.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: 'When we arrived at the Sami settlement, I was so surprised to find that they weren't using electricity—or any other modern devices—like we had thought they would.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'They still use the most traditional means to provide light for themselves.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'So in actuality, life in this community is no different than when the first Columbian expedition team chanced upon them many years ago, and modern technology has changed very little.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: How could this be...? But those smiles...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Pudding... It's too soon to feel bad, there's still more.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: *ahem* 'However, I was also surprised that they hadn't entirely discarded the notion of using modern technology.'
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: 'What they have done instead is live alongside it in their own unique Sami way.'
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Seems like there's a photo in the envelope.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Light.
Pudding sees light, before tears cloud her eyes.
There is no doubt this light comes from modern civilization. A soft, cold light is emitted by the diodes powered by Originium.
But there is not even a single electrical light in the photo.
She sees a horned creature emerging from the forest, like the first ice crystals shaken from the treetops.
Its fur glistens like moonlight.
So that's an ice sculpture? I thought it was real!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Wow, so the Sami people actually stuffed light tubes into their ice sculptures to make that shiny fur. It's beautiful.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: I have to say, this is my new favorite story.
attributes.name: Medical Department Operator

attributes.content: There's more at the very bottom...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Celica had written another paragraph.
'Did you see the photo? I never read about the Sami people doing anything like this in books, but I saw this with my own eyes.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Your efforts didn't change how they live, but this result... I think it feels just as wonderful.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'I don't know if you feel the same. But when I saw that, I felt like I saw something new, and yet ordinary.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Like something that has always been with us, that we've never properly looked at until now.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Sami isn't a static snow globe. This land has always been beyond our imaginations.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'Pudding, I'll continue striving onwards, but not necessarily to change anything. The future will change on its own.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: 'I can't just stay like this, even if only to witness the many different vistas out there.'
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I... can't just stay like this.
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: I'm not seeing things, am I?
attributes.name: Medical Department Operator

attributes.content: Is that... Pudding? Outside?
attributes.name: Medical Department Operator

attributes.content: Oh, hello everyone.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Hello.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I'm accompanying Pudding outside to do some maintenance work on the landship equipment. It's the first time she's left the ship ever since she got here.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Medical Department Operator

attributes.content: Don't look at me like that, I didn't drag her out. She chose this on her own.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: She was very enthusiastic on the way here, go take a look if you don't believe me.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Pudding... seems to be trembling a little.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Scary... It's so scary...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: P-Pillow... I think I really shouldn't... shouldn't...
attributes.name: Pudding

attributes.content: Go outside!
attributes.name: Pudding
